test_case.query_expression: SELECT s.s_suppkey, s.s_name, ( SELECT p_brand, count(*) AS total FROM public.partx10 AS p, public.partsuppx10 AS ps WHERE s.s_suppkey = ps.ps_suppkey AND ps.ps_partkey = p.p_partkey GROUP BY p_brand ORDER BY total DESC LIMIT 3 ) AS aggregates FROM public.supplierx10 AS s WHERE s.s_suppkey < 101
